post.author: 권상하
post.content:
QA Tester Mississauga, ON $50/Hour
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
QA TESTER Our Mississauga based client is seeking a QA Tester with recent, hands-on experience with LOADRUNNER, (preferably 8.1.1) and QUALITY CENTRE. The successful candidate will have : extensive experience developing and executing test plans, writing test scripts and test cases and conducting performance testing experience using Automated Test Tools experience in business requirements analysis (used to develop testing requirements) proven ability to communicate to all levels within a project understanding of Project Life Cycle phases and deliverables Strong experience with the following technologies is required : N-tier database applications (SQL, Relational Database); Relational Database Management Systems: Specifically Oracle 9i Web applications: HTML, ASP, J2EE Architecture Operating Systems: Unix, Linux, AIX, Windows Programming languages: C and VB (Unix Shell Scripting, PL/SQL would be an asset) Different Protocols supported by LoadRunner (Java, WebServices, .NET, ODBC, Tuxedo, HTTP, https, etc) Knowledge of related technologies: ASP, VBScript, XML, .NET and SQL [view full job]
Type Contract Advertiser ProVision IT Resources Ltd (Employment Business) Contact Human Resources Department Ref JS2851 Date 15/04/2009 04:45:06
post.title: QA Tester Mississauga, ON $50/Hour
